Description: Rectangular wooden inner-coffin of Sobekhotep with painted decoration: wedjat-eyes and a false-door on the exterior, a frieze of funerary objects on the interior; text inside and out.
Curator's comments: PM I Part 2: p.82 Harco Willems Chests of Life (1988) p.116-117 [cat no.T3L]. Nicholson and Shaw, Ancient Egyptian Materials and Technology (Cambridge 2000), p. 350
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
